entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
